H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H1954.def: = man, also known as {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his original name was Hoshea, which was later changed by Moses to Joshua; he was Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H882.def: = man; ◄ Hittite; ► father of {L:Judith<SDBH:יְהוּדִית>}, wife of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}

H3117.def: = the time of day that it is light, as opposed to the time that it is dark

H5818.def: = man, also known as {L:Azariah<SDBH:עֲזַרְיָה>}; ◄ son of {L:Amaziah<SDBH:אֲמַצְיָהוּ>}; tribe of Judah; ► father of {L:Jotham<SDBH:יֹותָם>}; king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}, but became leprous after he burned incense in the temple

H3147.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Gideon<SDBH:גִּדְעֹון>}, the judge of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} who is also known as {L:Jerubbaal<SDBH:יְרֻבַּעַל>}; tribe of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}; ► known for the fable that he told about the inhabitants of {L:Shechem<SDBH:שְׁכֶם>}

H271.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Jotham<SDBH:יֹותָם>}; ► king of southern kingdom of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H3169.def: = man, also known as {L:Hezekiah<SDBH:חִזְקִיָּהוּ>}; ◄ son of {L:Ahaz<SDBH:אָחָז>}; ► father of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}; king of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H3063.def: = man, tribe, and territory; ◄ fourth son of {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Leah<SDBH:לֵאָה>}; ► founder of one of the tribes of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}, which became a separate kingdom (opposed to Israel) after the death of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>}, and, after the exile, a separate administrative district

H3379.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Nebath<SDBH:נְבָט>}; ► former servant of {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>} who later became the first king of the northern kingdom of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H3101.def: = man; ◄ tribe of {L:Manasseh<SDBH:מְנַשֶּׁה>}; ► father of {L:Gideon<SDBH:גִּדְעֹון>}, judge of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H3478.def: = man, also known as {L:Jacob<SDBH:יַעֲקֹב>} and {L:Jeshurun<SDBH:יְשֻׁרוּן>}, including the ethnic group that is regarded to be his descendants; ◄ son of {L:Isaac<SDBH:יִצְחָק>} and {L:Rebekah<SDBH:רִבְקָה>}, brother of {L:Esau<SDBH:עֵשָׂו>}, and ► father of twelve sons -- after whom the tribes of Israel were named -- and one daughter

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H1954.def: = man, also known as {L:Joshua<SDBH:יְהֹושֻׁעַ>} and {L:Jeshua<SDBH:יֵשׁוּעַ>}; ◄ son of {L:Nun<SDBH:נוּן>}; tribe of {L:Ephraim<SDBH:אֶפְרַיִם>}; ► one of the twelve men sent by {L:Moses<SDBH:מֹשֶׁה>} to spy out the land; his original name was Hoshea, which was later changed by Moses to Joshua; he was Moses' assistant, who later became his successor and brought {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} into {L:Canaan<SDBH:כְּנַעַן>}

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H2183.def: = action by which humans engage in prostitution; ≈ associated with unfaithfulness

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H3206.def: = posterity of humans and or animals of undetermined sex, at an age ranging from before birth to adulthood

H776.def: = the earth as opposed to the sky; sometimes used in a more specific sense to denote part of the earth, such as the dry land as opposed to the sea, or a specific region, area, country, or plot of land

H310.def: = the side or part of something away from the spectator or from the direction in which it moves or faces

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H1818.def: = red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of {L:life<SDBH:נֶפֶשׁ>}; human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

H1004.def: = construction surrounded by walls and covered with a roof; ◄ normally made of stones, wood, or clay; ► to be used as living quarters, for storage, as a prison, as a sanctuary, etc.; sometimes used to denote a smaller part of a large construction

H3058.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Jehoshaphat<SDBH:יְהֹושָׁפָט>}, son of {L:Nimshi<SDBH:נִמְשִׁי>}; ► king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} (c. 841-814)
